short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically shows transcript when watching YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I always open the transcript sidebar on YouTube while watching videos, and it gets tedious to select the menu and click "Show transcript" on each video. For whatever reason there is no built-in option to always show transcript, so if you are in the same situation, this extension automatically opens the transcript sidebar on YouTube.
